targets.query: SELECT last("speed") as "Ethernet" FROM "ip hotspot" WHERE "time" > now() - 1m AND "active" = 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "mac"
SELECT last("signal") as "Wi-Fi" FROM "ip hotspot"  WHERE  "time" > now() - 1m AND "active" = 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "mac"
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" LIMIT 1
SELECT last("rxspeed"), last("txspeed") FROM "interface stat" WHERE ("name"::tag = 'PPPoE1')  LIMIT 1
SELECT last("rxspeed"), last("txspeed") FROM "interface stat" WHERE ("name"::tag = 'PPPoE0')  LIMIT 1
SELECT last("rxspeed"), last("txspeed") FROM "interface stat" WHERE ("name"::tag = 'OpenVPN0')  LIMIT 1
SELECT last("rxspeed"), last("txspeed") FROM "interface stat" WHERE ("name"::tag = 'Wireguard0')  LIMIT 1
SELECT  last("state") as "State" FROM "interface" GROUP BY "description"
SELECT last("internet") as "Internet", last("dns-accessible") as "DNS", last("gateway-accessible") as "Gateway" FROM "internet status" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT (mean("memtotal") - mean("memfree") - mean("membuffers") - mean("memcache")) as "RAM Usage" FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("cpuload") as "CPU Usage" FROM "system" Limit 1
SELECT mean("cpuload") as "CPU Usage" FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("memtotal") - mean("memfree") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("memtotal") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT(mean("rxspeed")) FROM "interface stat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT(mean("txspeed")) FROM "interface stat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("rxbytes")) + non_negative_difference(mean("txbytes")) FROM "ip hotspot" WHERE $timeFilter AND "active" = 1 GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("sumspeed")) FROM "autogen"."ip hotspot" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("rxbytes")) FROM "interface stat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("txbytes")) FROM "interface stat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("cpu") AS "CPU", mean("memory") AS "RAM" FROM "processes" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"
